software.name: 2020 Super Baseball
software.Description: Conventional baseball no longer exists in the year 2020. The "Super Baseball Association" has been very profitable over the years with robotics power players up against the strongest of athletes. Due to the secret manipulation of certain robotics team players, abilities have been computer controlled to decide the outcome of certain games, benefitting the SBA. Die hard players discovered the SBA's cheating and have now disconnected several parts of the computers to achieve fair and challenging play. Now the games may continue in the famed "Cyber-Egg" Stadium where only power and skill will determine the winner!

software.name: 3 Count Bout
software.Description: The Power. The Pain. The Glory. Lock horns with 10 of the world's most rambunctious wrestlers ever! In the ring, on the street, use your wits, ability, and various tools at your disposal to pummel, pound, bite, scratch, kick, and gouge your way to survival and the world championship. Master your surroundings, develop new attacks, and press those buttons in matches so brutal and real you'll be checking your own body for bruises and your own mouth for loose teeth. This isn't just another wrestling game, it's THE wrestling game, brought to you in 106 super-charged megabytes of NEO GEO power!

software.name: ADK World
software.Description: ADK World is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Aero Fighters 2
software.Description: Up in the skies above 8 countries, control one of 8 fighters and join the sonic dogfight! With 4 level shooting and special weapons, blow out your enemies!

software.name: Aero Fighters 3
software.Description: Aero Fighters 3 is an Action game, developed by Video System and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Aggressors of Dark Kombat
software.Description: Anything goes to beat up your enemies! No rules. No limitations for the fight! Aerial battle, Provoking, Faking, and Throwing... Anything is available! Weapons, strangleholds. No mercy even to the weakened enemy! Throwing attack? Fist fight? Try whatever you like!

software.name: Alpha Mission II
software.Description: The year is 2525. It's been 10 years since the "SYD" super jet plane installed the "Armored scrum Object" and one pilot saved space. A mysterious invasion of space has started again. The humans seriously damaged by the attack can only turn to the "Legendary Hero". "SYD" was given to Alpha Mission II to stand by for the partner's ride. Break through the defense line and destroy the core!

software.name: Art of Fighting
software.Description: Being a great fighter takes more than strength and pain. You need wisdom and need to win at any cost. Ryo Sakazaki's sister has been kidnapped and it leads Ryo and Robert, two of the greatest fighters of all time, on the most dangerous search of their lives... You'll discover magic techinques to master THE ART OF FIGHTING!

software.name: Art of Fighting 2
software.Description: RYO and ROBERT return along with 10 of the meanest maulers of SOUTHTOWN. Use new characters and the RAGE GAUGE, visit new places, meet new enemeis; then push their faces in with your newly acquired arts of ARMAGEDDON!

software.name: Art of Fighting 3
software.Description: Released in 1996, Art of Fighting 3: The Path of the Warrior is a fighting game set in Grasshill Valley, where drama and battles unfold among various fighters. Aside from the protagonists Ryo and Robert, this installment has all-new characters. Art of Fighting 3: The Path of the Warrior features powerful airborne combos, more efficient parrying maneuvers, the ability to inflict damage to downed opponents, and the Ultimate K.O., which allows characters to win a match in just one round. Furthermore, the graphics are based off of motion capture technology rendering them smoother than ever before, making it one of the most innovative 2D fighting games at the time.
software.AKA: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (JP)

Release.name: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden

ReleaseImages.Image: Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (JP)-20838_front.jpg
Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (JP)-20838_back.jpg

Release.name: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (Limited Edition)

ReleaseImages.Image: Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (Limited Edition) (JP)-20839_front.jpg
Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (Limited Edition) (JP)-20839_back.jpg

software.name: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden
software.Description: Released in 1996, Art of Fighting 3: The Path of the Warrior is a fighting game set in Grasshill Valley, where drama and battles unfold among various fighters. Aside from the protagonists Ryo and Robert, this installment has all-new characters. Art of Fighting 3: The Path of the Warrior features powerful airborne combos, more efficient parrying maneuvers, the ability to inflict damage to downed opponents, and the Ultimate K.O., which allows characters to win a match in just one round. Furthermore, the graphics are based off of motion capture technology rendering them smoother than ever before, making it one of the most innovative 2D fighting games at the time.
software.AKA: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (JP)

Release.name: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden

ReleaseImages.Image: Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (JP)-20838_front.jpg
Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (JP)-20838_back.jpg

Release.name: Art of Fighting: Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (Limited Edition)

ReleaseImages.Image: Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (Limited Edition) (JP)-20839_front.jpg
Art of Fighting Ryuuko no Ken Gaiden (Limited Edition) (JP)-20839_back.jpg

software.name: ASO II: Last Guardian
software.Description: The year is 2525. It's been 10 years since the "SYD" super jet plane installed the "Armored scrum Object" and one pilot saved space. A mysterious invasion of space has started again. The humans seriously damaged by the attack can only turn to the "Legendary Hero". "SYD" was given to Alpha Mission II to stand by for the partner's ride. Break through the defense line and destroy the core!

software.name: Bakumatsu Rouman Dai Ni Maku: Gekka no Kenshi
software.Description: The Last Blade 2, originally released in 1998, is the sequel to the fighting game, The Last Blade, which was released a year before. It picks up where the previous title left off and takes the story of battling at the gates of hell to its climax. This time around, there are 16 unique swordsmen from which to choose. Choose from 2 sword types (Strength and Attack). Deflect your enemy's attacks with "Repel". You can also cancel game-changing special moves like "Super Secret Slice" or "Hidden Secret Slice" with a "Sublime Slash", which connects to Super Secret Slice - just like in the previous title. And there are even some new features like aerial repels, aerial guards and knockdown recovery. Take your battles to a whole 'nother level!
software.AKA: Bakumatsu Rouman Dai Ni Maku: Gekka no Kenshi (JP)

Release.name: Bakumatsu Rouman Dai Ni Maku: Gekka no Kenshi

ReleaseImages.Image: Bakumatsu Rouman Dai Ni Maku Gekka no Kenshi (JP)-20195_front.jpg
Bakumatsu Rouman Dai Ni Maku Gekka no Kenshi (JP)-20195_back.jpg
Bakumatsu Rouman Dai Ni Maku Gekka no Kenshi (JP)-20195_side.jpg

software.name: Bakumatsu Rouman: Gekka no Kenshi
software.Description: 1863. History's hidden secret is revealed. During the age known as "Bakumatsu", 135 years ago, chaos rules! It's all yours: A new type of weapon fighting game in which Power and Speed weapons, in addition to various Repel moves can be used to experience a new sensation in video game thrills!

software.name: Baseball Stars 2
software.Description: Baseball Stars 2 is baseball at its finest! A game made by players for players. Play in two leagues, Fighting and Exciting, against a global league of all-stars. Strike outs, stealing home, home runs, diving catches, and POWER hitting are just a few of the action-packed attractions found in this sequel of sequels!

software.name: Baseball Stars Professional
software.Description:
An All Star Line Up
Big League Players hit, run, throw and make dynamic plays! Enjoy real-life baseball excitement in VS-Mode and Tournament Mode!

software.name: Big Tournament Golf
software.Description: The player picks one of six available golfers and competes on a number of golf courses around the world, including Japan (Fujiyama Oriental Golf Club), America (Grand Canyon Golf Course), Australia (Blue Lagoon Golf Course), and Germany (Baden Golf Course). The game features two modes of play. The first is Stroke Play, in which the player attempts to get the best score by playing all 18 holes. The second is Match Play, in which two players compete to see who can win more of the 18 holes. Get ready to hit the fairway!

software.name: Blue's Journey
software.Description: Blue's Journey is an Action game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Breakers
software.Description: Breakers is an Action game, developed and published by Visco, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Burning Fight
software.Description: The Castella family from the Metro City started ruining the peaceful city of Osaka with the violent Japanese group "Heiwa-gumi". To stop the fight, Metro police dispatched two dangerous characters, Duke and Billy, to Japan. With the support of the famous Japanese detective Ryu, they decided to rush into the enemy's fortress. Ruthless violence in the neon lights of Osaka. Will there be an end to this war?

software.name: Bust-A-Move
software.Description: Which will burst first: your concentration or the level you're working on? It takes more than just swinging the bubble-turret and taking aim on the falling ceiling; tactical planning and mental dexterity are the only way to string together three or more bubbles and 100 wins to make it through all the bubble and ego-bursting rounds of Bust-A-Move!

software.name: CDZ Hardware
software.Description: Neo-Geo CD is a Hardware game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Chotetsu Brikin'ger
software.Description: Ironclad is an Action game, developed by Saurus and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Choujin Gakuen Gowcaizer
software.Description: The ultimate warriors are ready for battle! The Auto-Zoom feature draws you in to the red-hot action! Use the new "Special Attack Tracing System" to copy the special abilities of the foes you defeat and build your own warrior from over 100 combinations!

software.name: Crossed Swords
software.Description: The legend of the strongest fighting lord of all time! Radical RPG points. Unlike your average RPG scoring system, this slasher rates points for power, speed, and magic! Transform from the real world into a world of knights doing battle to destroy "Nausizz", the King of terror and the messenger of the evil world. Use your slashing skills, magic, and counterattack!

software.name: Crossed Swords II
software.Description: Crossed Swords II is an Action game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Cyber-Lip
software.Description: Up until now, mankind has enjoyed their prosperity. Now they are facing trouble. CYBER-LIP, the state-of-the-art army computer is out of control. The cyborgs and aliens under its control are beginning to attack people. The government calls in Rick and Brooks to destroy CYBER-LIP!

software.name: Double Dragon
software.Description: Return to the Legend of the Dragons! All-new powerful special attacks which have never been seen before! Special attacks which allow the player who is behind to catch up. Transformations by Billy and Jimmy, which are unthinkable. Auto-zoom playfield, which depends on the distance between the two players.

software.name: Dunk Dream
software.Description: Which team is the best at 3-on-3? Choose from ten countries to find out. Shots vary according to the shooting distance. Fake dunk, aloof - a variety of techniques to choose from! Speedy! Powerful! Move your body to hip hoppin' rap music. When the power guage reaches its max, Super Dunk sparks!

software.name: Fatal Fury
software.Description: Fighting is one of the oldest sports of all time, for warriors being the BEST is the ultimate goal... But being the best can be Fatal. Be Andy, Terry or Joe and journey from city to city to defeat their top fighters. Use their uncontrollable Fury to reach Geese in this Head-to-Head fighting spectacular!
software.AKA: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury (US), Garou Densetsu: Shukumei no Tatakai (JP)

Release.name: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury

ReleaseImages.Image: Fatal Fury The Battle of Fury (US)-20745_front.jpg
Fatal Fury The Battle of Fury (US)-20745_back.jpg

software.name: Fatal Fury 2
software.Description: The three lone wolves return to clash with new opponents in the "Sultan of Slugs" Battle Royale. After a year in training, forging bodies of steel, Andy, Joe, and Terry take on the world. The ultimate Bout charged with the power of NEO-GEO's 100 Mega Shock. Fatal Fury 2! Each player can choose the same character from the 8 heroes. Special attacks explode with more action. 3D battles bring you to the next stage in the fighting game evolution. Easy maneuverability and realistic choreography.

software.name: Fatal Fury 3
software.Description: Fatal Fury 3 is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1995.

Release.name: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory

ReleaseImages.Image: Fatal Fury 3 Road to the Final Victory (US)-20758_front.jpg

software.name: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory
software.Description: Fatal Fury 3 is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1995.
software.AKA: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory (US), Garou Densetsu 3: Haruka-naru Tatakai (JP)

Release.name: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory

ReleaseImages.Image: Fatal Fury 3 Road to the Final Victory (US)-20758_front.jpg

software.name: Fatal Fury Special
software.Description: The GRANDMOTHER of all battles! 15 of the FATAL FURY series' top stars gather in the match of the millenium! Use the resurrected Geese Howard and Wolfgang Krauser in a dazzling 3D arena! All you have ever wanted in a fighting game is here in FATAL FURY SPECIAL!

software.name: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury
software.Description: Fighting is one of the oldest sports of all time, for warriors being the BEST is the ultimate goal... But being the best can be Fatal. Be Andy, Terry or Joe and journey from city to city to defeat their top fighters. Use their uncontrollable Fury to reach Geese in this Head-to-Head fighting spectacular!
software.AKA: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury (US), Garou Densetsu: Shukumei no Tatakai (JP)

Release.name: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury

ReleaseImages.Image: Fatal Fury The Battle of Fury (US)-20745_front.jpg
Fatal Fury The Battle of Fury (US)-20745_back.jpg

software.name: Fighter's History Dynamite
software.Description: The quest to defeat the mysterious Baron of Battlers, the mysterious K, is on. In order to get to this grotesque gladiator, however, you need to fight your way through 11 matches with the most skilled, most deadly of all combatants in the world of physical contact. Use your powers of pulverization, psychic energy blasts, and ridiculous strength to become the explosive fighting god in FIGHTERS HISTORY DYNAMITE!

software.name: Fire Suplex
software.Description: The Power. The Pain. The Glory. Lock horns with 10 of the world's most rambunctious wrestlers ever! In the ring, on the street, use your wits, ability, and various tools at your disposal to pummel, pound, bite, scratch, kick, and gouge your way to survival and the world championship. Master your surroundings, develop new attacks, and press those buttons in matches so brutal and real you'll be checking your own body for bruises and your own mouth for loose teeth. This isn't just another wrestling game, it's THE wrestling game, brought to you in 106 super-charged megabytes of NEO GEO power!

software.name: Flying Power Disk
software.Description: A dazzling new game combining the thrills of tennis, the dangers of the discus, and the heart-stopping competition of competition sports. Six of the world's toughest and most clever athletes take court in the most thrilling new sport of the fin-de-seicle! WINDJAMMERS - It will blow you away!

software.name: Football Frenzy
software.Description: You'll never play another football game again, after you play Football Frenzy! Football Frenzy, with on-going play-by-play announcing, is hard-hitting action at its best! You will hear, in full stereo, every bone-crushing tackle and helmet-to-helmet, metal-on-metal hit. The piercing grunts and groans of players sacrificing their bodies for the team puts you right on the field with them! The camera zooms give you the most dazzling close-ups ever seen. So, bring your pads and helmet! Tournament mode, cinematic displays and over 10 teams to choose from make this football package complete. Play against the computer or a friend in this 46-MEG bone-jarring gridiron great... Football Frenzy!

software.name: Fu'un Mokushiroku: Kakutou Sousei
software.Description: When these warriors collide, they rumble like thunder and strike like lightning. And in the fiercest of battles, the mighty gladiators must struggle to obtain supreme power or fall by the wayside. As they take on the world, remember to carry a steel umbrella or get pounded by - the Savage Reign!

software.name: Futsal: 5 on 5 Mini Soccer
software.Description: Futsal: 5 on 5 Mini Soccer is a Sports game, published by Saurus, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Galaxy Fight: Universal Warriors
software.Description: People have prayed to the gods, but the devil descends from the sky. Your mission is to defeat Felden Kryse, ruler of the underworld. The fantastic challenge ferociously unfolds on eight different planets. Screen image changes on-the-fly to zoom in and out based on how the battle unfolds. Use Dash to your utmost advantage, and speed through the field of infinity.

software.name: Garou Densetsu 2: Arata-naru Tatakai
software.Description: The three lone wolves return to clash with new opponents in the "Sultan of Slugs" Battle Royale. After a year in training, forging bodies of steel, Andy, Joe, and Terry take on the world. The ultimate Bout charged with the power of NEO-GEO's 100 Mega Shock. Fatal Fury 2! Each player can choose the same character from the 8 heroes. Special attacks explode with more action. 3D battles bring you to the next stage in the fighting game evolution. Easy maneuverability and realistic choreography.

software.name: Garou Densetsu 3: Haruka-naru Tatakai
software.Description: Fatal Fury 3 is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1995.
software.AKA: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory (US), Garou Densetsu 3: Haruka-naru Tatakai (JP)

Release.name: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory

ReleaseImages.Image: Fatal Fury 3 Road to the Final Victory (US)-20758_front.jpg

software.name: Garou Densetsu Special
software.Description: The GRANDMOTHER of all battles! 15 of the FATAL FURY series' top stars gather in the match of the millenium! Use the resurrected Geese Howard and Wolfgang Krauser in a dazzling 3D arena! All you have ever wanted in a fighting game is here in FATAL FURY SPECIAL!

software.name: Garou Densetsu: Shukumei no Tatakai
software.Description: Fighting is one of the oldest sports of all time, for warriors being the BEST is the ultimate goal... But being the best can be Fatal. Be Andy, Terry or Joe and journey from city to city to defeat their top fighters. Use their uncontrollable Fury to reach Geese in this Head-to-Head fighting spectacular!
software.AKA: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury (US), Garou Densetsu: Shukumei no Tatakai (JP)

Release.name: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury

ReleaseImages.Image: Fatal Fury The Battle of Fury (US)-20745_front.jpg
Fatal Fury The Battle of Fury (US)-20745_back.jpg

software.name: Ghost Pilots
software.Description: Bombs, Missiles, Bullets! Close to the end of the war, rumor of "A huge natural resource found in F Country" was spreading among countries suffering from lack of war supplies. Neutral F Country, with its antiquated military, suddenly became the target of super powers C and D Country. They became involved in the war. Exciting shooting game with dive-bombing and steep climbs by enemy jet fighters. Rush to the battlefield!

software.name: Idol Mahjong Final Romance 2
software.Description: Idol Mahjong Final Romance 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Video System and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Ironclad
software.Description: Ironclad is an Action game, developed by Saurus and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Janshin Densetsu: Quest of Jongmaster
software.Description: Janshin Densetsu: Quest of Jongmaster is a Miscellaneous game, published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Joy Joy Kid
software.Description: Once upon a time, the god of sun built a huge wall in the center of the "man's village" and the "woman's village" where they had been fighting for a long, long time. This caused even more trouble, in that the tower blocked all the sunlight to both villages. Rad and Am were sent to travel up the tower of sun full of various falling blocks. Capable of 2-player simultaneous drop-in play!

software.name: Kabuki Klash
software.Description: Kabuki Klash is an Action game, developed by Racdym and published by SNK, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Karnov's Revenge
software.Description: The quest to defeat the mysterious Baron of Battlers, the mysterious K, is on. In order to get to this grotesque gladiator, however, you need to fight your way through 11 matches with the most skilled, most deadly of all combatants in the world of physical contact. Use your powers of pulverization, psychic energy blasts, and ridiculous strength to become the explosive fighting god in FIGHTERS HISTORY DYNAMITE!

software.name: King of Fighters '94, The
software.Description: Walk into battle with your head held high! In The King of Fighters, you'll never fight alone! Choose one of eight teams in this all-out battle spectacular. Teams from Fatal Fury, Art of Fighting, Ikari Warriors, and a few uncharted areas come together for the first time ever. Dodge attacks, tag-off with team members, use your special King Krusher Battle Moves and take the crown in The King of Fighters '94!

software.name: King of Fighters '95, The
software.Description: Fighter's Armageddon - Team Battle '95! 24 of SNK's greatest fighting stars in the dream battle of all ages! Form up to 2,000 terrific teams! Guide history's supreme warriors in your own unique team. Also featuring a new Team Edit function.

software.name: King of Fighters '96, The
software.Description: The battle of the dream teams '96 - READY! 27 of SNK's top fighting heroes face off for fisticuffs! Only King of Fighters lets you combine your favorite characters in exciting teams. Try out endless combinations and bop your way to the top with the toughest team of all! Over 2,900 possible team combinations using the Team Edit Function. It's too much!

software.name: King of Fighters '96: NEOGEO Collection, The
software.Description: The King of Fighters '96: NEOGEO Collection is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1997.

Release.name: The King of Fighters '96: NEOGEO Collection

ReleaseImages.Image: The King of Fighters '96 NEOGEO Collection (JP)-26983_front.jpg
The King of Fighters '96 NEOGEO Collection (JP)-26983_back.jpg

software.name: King of Fighters '97, The
software.Description: The King of Fighters 1997 begins! 29 characters to choose from! In addition to 2 new teams and 7 returning teams, 2 new characters can be found in the Edit Mode. Virtually unlimited choice in an impressive selection of 3,654 team edit combinations. Includes 2 types of playing modes. Which one can you handle - the aggressive Advanced Mode or the simple Extra Mode?

software.name: King of Fighters '98: Dream Match Never Ends, The
software.Description: The All-Star dream battle is here at last: It's King of Fighters '98! Here come 38 of your favorite characters from the King of Fighters series. Your favorite characters and teams are back! Filled with new surprises like the Roulette Team Edit and Advantage System, King '98 will pop your cork with unrelenting excitement!
software.AKA: The King of Fighters '98: Dream Match Never Ends (JP)

Release.name: The King of Fighters '98: Dream Match Never Ends

ReleaseImages.Image: The King of Fighters '98 Dream Match Never Ends (JP)-19623_front.jpg

The King of Fighters '98 The Slugfest (US)-19622_back.jpg

software.name: King of Fighters '98: The Slugfest, The
software.Description: The All-Star dream battle is here at last: It's King of Fighters '98! Here come 38 of your favorite characters from the King of Fighters series. Your favorite characters and teams are back! Filled with new surprises like the Roulette Team Edit and Advantage System, King '98 will pop your cork with unrelenting excitement!

ReleaseImages.Image: The King of Fighters '98 The Slugfest (US)-19622_front.jpg
The King of Fighters '98 The Slugfest (US)-19622_back.jpg

software.name: King of Fighters '99, The
software.Description: A new King Of Fighters begins! Featuring a new story centered around the enigmatic K'! 32 characters collide in battle, including 6 new characters! The new Striker Match revolutionizes combat battles! Special Art Gallery mode offers game sketches and unreleased illustrations!

Release.name: The King of Fighters '99: Millennium Battle

ReleaseImages.Image: The King of Fighters '99 Millennium Battle (US)-12293_front.jpg
The King of Fighters '99 Millennium Battle (US)-12293_back.jpg

software.name: King of Fighters '99: Millennium Battle, The
software.Description: A new King Of Fighters begins! Featuring a new story centered around the enigmatic K'! 32 characters collide in battle, including 6 new characters! The new Striker Match revolutionizes combat battles! Special Art Gallery mode offers game sketches and unreleased illustrations!

Release.name: The King of Fighters '99: Millennium Battle

ReleaseImages.Image: The King of Fighters '99 Millennium Battle (US)-12293_front.jpg
The King of Fighters '99 Millennium Battle (US)-12293_back.jpg

software.name: King of the Monsters 2: The Next Thing
software.Description: In 1996, the country of Japan was devastated by the monster invasion. Six monsters did battle in the most destructive and terrifying catastrophe of all time. The war lasted 3 years and is known in history books as the KING OF THE MONSTERS massacre. Three monsters survived and have become more advanced and dangerous than ever before. But now, a new nemesis is on the scene. The alien invasion will be the biggest challenge for Earth's monstrosity. An unimaginable rumble that will rock the world and this new war will certainly be coined by witnesses as the... King of the Monsters 2 colossal confrontation!

Release.name: King of the Monsters 2: The Next Thing

ReleaseImages.Image: King of the Monsters 2 The Next Thing (JP)-19832_front.jpg
King of the Monsters 2 The Next Thing (JP)-19832_back.jpg

software.name: Last Blade 2, The
software.Description: The Last Blade 2, originally released in 1998, is the sequel to the fighting game, The Last Blade, which was released a year before. It picks up where the previous title left off and takes the story of battling at the gates of hell to its climax. This time around, there are 16 unique swordsmen from which to choose. Choose from 2 sword types (Strength and Attack). Deflect your enemy's attacks with "Repel". You can also cancel game-changing special moves like "Super Secret Slice" or "Hidden Secret Slice" with a "Sublime Slash", which connects to Super Secret Slice - just like in the previous title. And there are even some new features like aerial repels, aerial guards and knockdown recovery. Take your battles to a whole 'nother level!

It's all yours: A new type of weapon fighting game in which Power and Speed weapons, in addition to various Repel moves can be used to experience a new sensation in video game thrills!

software.name: Last Hope
software.Description: Last Hope is an Action game, developed and published by NG:DEV.TEAM, which was released in Europe in 2007.

software.name: Last Resort
software.Description: Suddenly the symbol of the space age, Space Colony, was attacked by a computer virus. Would human beings be ruined by the civilization of their own development? SOS! SOS! People cannot wait any longer for a rescue operation of last resort! Armed with the super weapon, Force, which guards and attacks by its special movements, fight against unknown mechanical bodies in this great new side-scrolling shooter!

software.name: League Bowling
software.Description: The lanes are crowded every night with Big Time Pin Slammin' action! You call the shots selecting a right or left handed bowler. Determine ball weight, and develop the skills of the pro's as you skillfully throw a variety of shots that you control. So pop some refreshments and settle into this indoor sport like you've never seen before!

software.name: Magical Drop 2
software.Description: The worldwide arcade hit brought to you by Bandai will keep you bursting bubbles and stacking combo points in this puzzler that will have your brain bubbling!

software.name: Magician Lord
software.Description: Step into the sorcerer's world! Elta, the last descendant of the MAGICIAN LORD is on a journey to find the eight missing volumes of the Sorcerer's Books... To end the years of chaos and horror, and to help the land he loves.

software.name: Mahjong Kyoretsuden
software.Description: Mahjong Kyoretsuden is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Metal Slug
software.Description: The awesome combat-shooting game is now out on CD-ROM in a super powered-up version! Along with the Arcade Mission (Arcade version), compete for the best clear time and longest achieved distance in the newly added Combat School Mode. The NEO GEO CD version of Metal Slug. It will blow you away! Charge!

software.name: Metal Slug 2
software.Description: The Intelligence Agency has just intercepted a transmission concerning another full-scale coup. It's up to us to stop this with everything we got and hit them so hard, they'll never get up again! For this mission, Eri Kasamoto and Fio Germi have been newly assigned as your partners. If there aren't any further questions, you ship out at noon. I don't have to say it, but the fate of this mission rests on you! Good luck! We're pullin' for you!

software.name: Mutation Nation
software.Description: In the year 2050... Bio-chemistry and genetics has surpassed even our own imagination. A scientist who had been working on a bizarre genetic experiment is banned by his Superiors and suddenly, his bio-chemical laboratory collapses in a massive explosion. Years later, people become vulnerable to the same genetic virus... creating a nation of mutants... THE MUTATION NATION! Can you stop the mutation invasion?

software.name: NAM-1975
software.Description:
Back To The Nightmare.
NAM - 1975 - SUMMER The roar of helicopters overhead snaps us back into reality. Will never forget the nightmare of that Summer.

software.name: Neo Drift Out: New Technology
software.Description: Neo Drift Out: New Technology is a Racing game, developed by Visco and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Neo Turf Masters
software.Description: The player picks one of six available golfers and competes on a number of golf courses around the world, including Japan (Fujiyama Oriental Golf Club), America (Grand Canyon Golf Course), Australia (Blue Lagoon Golf Course), and Germany (Baden Golf Course). The game features two modes of play. The first is Stroke Play, in which the player attempts to get the best score by playing all 18 holes. The second is Match Play, in which two players compete to see who can win more of the 18 holes. Get ready to hit the fairway!

software.name: Neo-Geo CD
software.Description: Neo-Geo CD is a Hardware game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Neo-Geo CD Hardware
software.Description: Neo-Geo CD is a Hardware game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Neo-Geo CD Special
software.Description: Neo-Geo CD Special is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Ninja Combat
software.Description: Take control of the ninjas Joe (one player) and Hayabusa (two players), and enter into battle against a group of evil ninjas called the Kage Ichizoku. Make your way into their home fortress, Ninja Tower, which dominates a big city of the near future. Fight using normal attacks, jumps, special movements, and ninja materials that deliver damaging blows to all enemies on the screen. In addition, you'll find weapons and items to aid you along the way. Even better, as you progress in the game, reliable allies such as Musashi, Kagero, and Gembu will emerge to fight alongside you, allowing you to choose a new character in each stage.

software.name: Ninja Commando
software.Description: Players choose from among three ninjas - Joe, descended from the Koga ninja; Rayar, a woman who has learned the ways of the Iga ninja; and Ryu, descendant of the famous ninja Fuma Kotaro - as they pursue the merchant of death known as Spider, who plans to use a time machine to bring havoc to the world. The battle spans seven time periods, including the Stone Age, the Egyptian era, and the Japanese Civil War era. Each hero features a variety of attack options in addition to their own normal attack, including a deadly attack that inflicts damage on all enemies on the screen, special ninja-arts attacks, and finally, a powerful attack unleashed by taking on the "shape of the beast" when three scrolls have been collected.

software.name: Ninja Master's Haou Ninpou-chou
software.Description: First released in 1996, Ninja Master's, is set in the fictional land of "Zipangu". Players can select from 10 different ninjas and warriors with which to test their might. The main feature of this game is the ability for each character to use a wide variety of weapons. Also, as each characters Super Attacks change depending on whether they are armed or unarmed, the player needs to respond differently according to the situation. Damage increases with respect to the Super Power Gauge. There are also many must-see deadly techniques like "Super Death Blow", "Ultimate Super Mode", "Dark Super Power" and "Dark Combo!

software.name: Ninja Masters
software.Description: First released in 1996, Ninja Master's, is set in the fictional land of "Zipangu". Players can select from 10 different ninjas and warriors with which to test their might. The main feature of this game is the ability for each character to use a wide variety of weapons. Also, as each characters Super Attacks change depending on whether they are armed or unarmed, the player needs to respond differently according to the situation. Damage increases with respect to the Super Power Gauge. There are also many must-see deadly techniques like "Super Death Blow", "Ultimate Super Mode", "Dark Super Power" and "Dark Combo!

software.name: Oshidashi Zintrick
software.Description: Oshidashi Zintrick is a Puzzle game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: OverTop
software.Description: OverTop is a Racing game, published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Power Spikes II
software.Description: Power Spikes II is a Sports game, developed by Video System and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Pulstar
software.Description: 2256 A.D. Alien forces swept into the solar system, and fighting spread throughout the system in two years. An elite group force, codenamed: PULSTAR, remains as Earth's final hope. Take items to snap on powerful options! Break your enemies with the various arsenals!

software.name: Puzzle Bobble
software.Description: Which will burst first: your concentration or the level you're working on? It takes more than just swinging the bubble-turret and taking aim on the falling ceiling; tactical planning and mental dexterity are the only way to string together three or more bubbles and 100 wins to make it through all the bubble and ego-bursting rounds of Bust-A-Move!

software.name: Puzzled
software.Description: Once upon a time, the god of sun built a huge wall in the center of the "man's village" and the "woman's village" where they had been fighting for a long, long time. This caused even more trouble, in that the tower blocked all the sunlight to both villages. Rad and Am were sent to travel up the tower of sun full of various falling blocks. Capable of 2-player simultaneous drop-in play!

software.name: Quiz King of Fighters
software.Description: Quiz King of Fighters is a Miscellaneous game, published by Saurus, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Ragnagard
software.Description: Ragnagard is an Action game, developed by System Vision and published by Saurus, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Raguy
software.Description: Blue's Journey is an Action game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Rally Chase
software.Description: The ultimate challenge for the best pro drivers! This game realistically reproduces the data of two actual races - World Rally Championship (WRC) and Paris-Dakar Rally. These courses tempt you into a stage of big landscapes. Bump away the world's top driver's using the drift technique!

software.name: Real Bout Fatal Fury
software.Description: The Final Battle: Geese Howard Must Go! Geese Howard is back and firmly in the last boss's seat. Who will send him to his doom? Terry? Andy? A new challenger? Choose from 16 characters in 2-player mode and "Bust-In" Battles!

software.name: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2
software.Description: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2 is an Action game, published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Real Bout Fatal Fury Special
software.Description: The supreme trial of strength awaits! 19 of Fatal Fury's hottest heroes collide! One year since the fearsome conclusion to "Real Bout", the hungry wolves ready themselves for a new battle, "Real Bout Special" - the paramount pugilistic proving ground!

software.name: Real Bout Garou Densetsu
software.Description: The Final Battle: Geese Howard Must Go! Geese Howard is back and firmly in the last boss's seat. Who will send him to his doom? Terry? Andy? A new challenger? Choose from 16 characters in 2-player mode and "Bust-In" Battles!

software.name: Real Bout Garou Densetsu 2
software.Description: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2 is an Action game, published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Real Bout Garou Densetsu Special
software.Description: The supreme trial of strength awaits! 19 of Fatal Fury's hottest heroes collide! One year since the fearsome conclusion to "Real Bout", the hungry wolves ready themselves for a new battle, "Real Bout Special" - the paramount pugilistic proving ground!

software.name: Riding Hero
software.Description: Riding Hero is a Racing game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Robo Army
software.Description: In a world full of chaos and destruction, a new dark power ruled the land. The cyber army called Hell Jeed have come within reach of their final objective... to create cyber cities; robot-infested cities where no human can be found. A hostile takeover... the people were no match... the masses were slaughtered... their human brains used to equip the new soldiers of Hell Jeed. The cyber army's invasion struck fear into the population of the major cities and the few lucky inhabitants fled for their lives. Unprotected and battle scarred, the world seemed doomed and mankind's end near... But all hope was not lost. Maxima and Rocky have been called to return peace to the land. Will Hell Jeed dominate the world? Can Hell Jeed be stopped? In this 46-MEG 2-player action-smash, attempt to defeat the evil Hell Jeed by helping Maxima and Rocky, the two greatest war soldiers of the legendary ROBO ARMY!

software.name: Ryuuko no Ken
software.Description: Being a great fighter takes more than strength and pain. You need wisdom and need to win at any cost. Ryo Sakazaki's sister has been kidnapped and it leads Ryo and Robert, two of the greatest fighters of all time, on the most dangerous search of their lives... You'll discover magic techinques to master THE ART OF FIGHTING!

software.name: Ryuuko no Ken 2
software.Description: RYO and ROBERT return along with 10 of the meanest maulers of SOUTHTOWN. Use new characters and the RAGE GAUGE, visit new places, meet new enemeis; then push their faces in with your newly acquired arts of ARMAGEDDON!

software.name: Samurai Shodown
software.Description: Iza To! En Garde! Dude! Twelve of the mightiest samurai, ninja, knights, and warriors from Japan, France, the United States, and China lock swords in SAMURAI SHODOWN. With blades, bare knuckles, rage, and various Methods of Mayhem, fight your way to the final battle with Satan's Shogun. Use all powers at your disposal to get a head!

software.name: Samurai Shodown II
software.Description: To be or not to be? You'll soon find out the answer! They've licked their wounds, improved their techniques, and now they're back! The world's 15 fiercest warriors clang steel in a fast and furious fest of fencing festivities. Use new characters and new feints of Fury to hack, slice, dice, and Julien fry your way to victory!

software.name: Samurai Shodown III
software.Description: Cut or be cut! The power! The intensity! Samurai 3 is here! Twelve of the ages toughest double-identity warriors! Select personalities from "Chivalry" or "Treachery". Character moves and poses change with the personality you choose. Featuring three different battle modes!

software.name: Samurai Shodown IV: Amakusa's Revenge
software.Description: The mighty wrath of Shiro Amakusa is reborn! Who can stop him? The sparks fly when 17 swordsmen clash, and it all ends at the evil walls of Amakusa Castle! Featuring all your favorite warriors plus two new characters!

software.name: Samurai Spirits
software.Description: Iza To! En Garde! Dude! Twelve of the mightiest samurai, ninja, knights, and warriors from Japan, France, the United States, and China lock swords in SAMURAI SHODOWN. With blades, bare knuckles, rage, and various Methods of Mayhem, fight your way to the final battle with Satan's Shogun. Use all powers at your disposal to get a head!

software.name: Samurai Spirits: Amakusa Kourin
software.Description: The mighty wrath of Shiro Amakusa is reborn! Who can stop him? The sparks fly when 17 swordsmen clash, and it all ends at the evil walls of Amakusa Castle! Featuring all your favorite warriors plus two new characters!

software.name: Samurai Spirits: Zankurou Musouken
software.Description: Cut or be cut! The power! The intensity! Samurai 3 is here! Twelve of the ages toughest double-identity warriors! Select personalities from "Chivalry" or "Treachery". Character moves and poses change with the personality you choose. Featuring three different battle modes!

software.name: Savage Reign
software.Description: When these warriors collide, they rumble like thunder and strike like lightning. And in the fiercest of battles, the mighty gladiators must struggle to obtain supreme power or fall by the wayside. As they take on the world, remember to carry a steel umbrella or get pounded by - the Savage Reign!

software.name: Sengoku
software.Description: It's the final battle. A warlord in the past planned to conquer the world by brutal attack. Now, 400 years later, this "Demon Castle" suddenly appeared in the sky above Washington D.C. The prophecy came true! Only two samurai warriors with the special weapon can stop the revival of this ghost!

software.name: Sengoku 2
software.Description: The great confrontation with the demonic warlord in the Demon Castle should mean the end, but the war has just begun... The Demon Castle looms high above the land and the Sovereign of Darkness commands the towering fortress. The legendary samurai warriors are summoned again. Fight with more attack techniques, new power-ups, more magic, and transform into one of four identities as you battle through this 2-player simultaneous, action-fighting, monster of sequels, SENGOKU II.

software.name: Sengoku Denshou
software.Description: It's the final battle. A warlord in the past planned to conquer the world by brutal attack. Now, 400 years later, this "Demon Castle" suddenly appeared in the sky above Washington D.C. The prophecy came true! Only two samurai warriors with the special weapon can stop the revival of this ghost!

software.name: Sengoku Denshou 2
software.Description: The great confrontation with the demonic warlord in the Demon Castle should mean the end, but the war has just begun... The Demon Castle looms high above the land and the Sovereign of Darkness commands the towering fortress. The legendary samurai warriors are summoned again. Fight with more attack techniques, new power-ups, more magic, and transform into one of four identities as you battle through this 2-player simultaneous, action-fighting, monster of sequels, SENGOKU II.

software.name: Shin Samurai Spirits: Haohmaru Jigokuhen
software.Description: To be or not to be? You'll soon find out the answer! They've licked their wounds, improved their techniques, and now they're back! The world's 15 fiercest warriors clang steel in a fast and furious fest of fencing festivities. Use new characters and new feints of Fury to hack, slice, dice, and Julien fry your way to victory!

software.name: Shin-Oh-Ken
software.Description: Ragnagard is an Action game, developed by System Vision and published by Saurus, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Shinsetsu Samurai Spirits: Bushidou Retsuden
software.Description: Shinsetsu Samurai Spirits: Bushidou Retsuden is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Shogi no Tatsujin
software.Description: Shogi no Tatsujin is a Miscellaneous game, published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Soccer Brawl
software.Description: The Cybernetic players use special kick shots and built-in arm phasers to destroy other players. Make sure your power meter is FULL when exercising these brutal tactics. Both stadiums, which are magnetically enclosed, enable you to kick or pass... off the wall! There are no fouls in this league, so watch your back or you'll get pulverized by the opposing team! You'll find here the most advanced sport in the world of soccer... SOCCER BRAWL!

software.name: Sonic Wings 2
software.Description: Up in the skies above 8 countries, control one of 8 fighters and join the sonic dogfight! With 4 level shooting and special weapons, blow out your enemies!

software.name: Sonic Wings 3
software.Description: Aero Fighters 3 is an Action game, developed by Video System and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Stakes Winner
software.Description: Stakes Winner is a Sports game, published by Saurus, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Street Hoop
software.Description: Which team is the best at 3-on-3? Choose from ten countries to find out. Shots vary according to the shooting distance. Fake dunk, aloof - a variety of techniques to choose from! Speedy! Powerful! Move your body to hip hoppin' rap music. When the power guage reaches its max, Super Dunk sparks!

software.name: Super Sidekicks
software.Description: Experience the roar of the crowd and the thrills of the stadium. Along with your Ace Striker and his array of sliding, overhead, and diving shots, lead your team to victory and seize the prized SNK Cup. Watch players perform miraculous overhead and diving shots, dazzle your opponent with gravity-defying dribbling. Avoid sliding defense players and bone-crushing blocks. Be overwhelmed with in-your-face action so real, you'll be washing the grass stains off your clothing when you're finished!

software.name: Super Sidekicks 2
software.Description: Super Sidekicks 2 is a Sports game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Super Sidekicks 3
software.Description: Loaded with world class excitement! Features 6 competition modes like World Cup for 64 worldwide teams. Utilizes Digitized Trace Animation and 3D camera angled shots for a realistic on-the-fly action graphic explosion. With 8 different playing modes including options such as Speed and Stamina, you can mix and match 512 different team configurations. Accidents hinder or enhance a team's ability within head-to-head gameplay for the ultimate super-real soccer experience!
software.AKA: Tokuten Oh 3: Eikoue no Michi (JP), Super Sidekicks 3: The Next Glory (US)

software.name: Super Sidekicks 3: The Next Glory
software.Description: Loaded with world class excitement! Features 6 competition modes like World Cup for 64 worldwide teams. Utilizes Digitized Trace Animation and 3D camera angled shots for a realistic on-the-fly action graphic explosion. With 8 different playing modes including options such as Speed and Stamina, you can mix and match 512 different team configurations. Accidents hinder or enhance a team's ability within head-to-head gameplay for the ultimate super-real soccer experience!
software.AKA: Tokuten Oh 3: Eikoue no Michi (JP), Super Sidekicks 3: The Next Glory (US)

software.name: Super Spy, The
software.Description: The Super Spy is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Tengai Makyou Shinden
software.Description: Kabuki Klash is an Action game, developed by Racdym and published by SNK, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Tokuten Oh 2
software.Description: Super Sidekicks 2 is a Sports game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Tokuten Oh 3: Eikoue no Michi
software.Description: Loaded with world class excitement! Features 6 competition modes like World Cup for 64 worldwide teams. Utilizes Digitized Trace Animation and 3D camera angled shots for a realistic on-the-fly action graphic explosion. With 8 different playing modes including options such as Speed and Stamina, you can mix and match 512 different team configurations. Accidents hinder or enhance a team's ability within head-to-head gameplay for the ultimate super-real soccer experience!
software.AKA: Tokuten Oh 3: Eikoue no Michi (JP), Super Sidekicks 3: The Next Glory (US)

software.name: Tokuten Oh: Super Sidekicks
software.Description: Experience the roar of the crowd and the thrills of the stadium. Along with your Ace Striker and his array of sliding, overhead, and diving shots, lead your team to victory and seize the prized SNK Cup. Watch players perform miraculous overhead and diving shots, dazzle your opponent with gravity-defying dribbling. Avoid sliding defense players and bone-crushing blocks. Be overwhelmed with in-your-face action so real, you'll be washing the grass stains off your clothing when you're finished!

software.name: Top Hunter
software.Description: Clean up the Space Pirates! Time: The age of space colonialism. The dreaded Klaptons are on the loose, turning peaceful settlements into ghost towns. Searching for the price on the Klapton's heads come the cosmic bounty hunters RODDY and CATHY. Do these two have what it takes to save the universe? Can they work together without competing for the rewards themselves? Their fate, and the fate of the free universe is IN YOUR HANDS - the legendary team known as TOP HUNTER!

software.name: Top Hunter: Roddy & Cathy
software.Description: Clean up the Space Pirates! Time: The age of space colonialism. The dreaded Klaptons are on the loose, turning peaceful settlements into ghost towns. Searching for the price on the Klapton's heads come the cosmic bounty hunters RODDY and CATHY. Do these two have what it takes to save the universe? Can they work together without competing for the rewards themselves? Their fate, and the fate of the free universe is IN YOUR HANDS - the legendary team known as TOP HUNTER!

software.name: Top Player's Golf
software.Description: First Class Competition! On a beautiful course, silent competition will begin. Select from four individual players. Play a Nassau game for a different twist. Enjoy real-life golf excitement!

software.name: Tsukai Gan Gan Koshinkyoku
software.Description: Anything goes to beat up your enemies! No rules. No limitations for the fight! Aerial battle, Provoking, Faking, and Throwing... Anything is available! Weapons, strangleholds. No mercy even to the weakened enemy! Throwing attack? Fist fight? Try whatever you like!

software.name: Twinkle Star Sprites
software.Description: Twinkle Star Sprites is an Action game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1997.

software.name: Viewpoint
software.Description: Enter the world of Viewpoint, this stunning 3D diagonal-scrolling shooter, a visual masterpiece which allows you to play from a three-quarter perspective. Unimaginable enemies and inventive traps lurk around every corner and the intense action will rattle your senses! Enough gameplay to please even the most advanced gamer. Begin the fight with the rapid-fire gun and along the way collect the three shot device of destruction. Also, store energy to use The Wave in 4 levels of power. Or, choose from one of three different bombs to shoot your way through 6 stages of the most spectacular warzones of all time!

software.name: Voltage Fighter Gowcaizer
software.Description: The ultimate warriors are ready for battle! The Auto-Zoom feature draws you in to the red-hot action! Use the new "Special Attack Tracing System" to copy the special abilities of the foes you defeat and build your own warrior from over 100 combinations!

software.name: WindJammers
software.Description: A dazzling new game combining the thrills of tennis, the dangers of the discus, and the heart-stopping competition of competition sports. Six of the world's toughest and most clever athletes take court in the most thrilling new sport of the fin-de-seicle! WINDJAMMERS - It will blow you away!

software.name: World Heroes
software.Description: Are you ready for a fierce battle in an ultra-deathmatch!? Who is the greatest hero in the world? You will find out today! A scientist has created a time machine that eight heroes will travel through time with to prove who is the greatest fighter of all time!

software.name: World Heroes 2
software.Description: The HEROES are back in their biggest and meanest battle ever, along with six new contestants! Travel through time and face an onslaught of opponents in an exciting, bruising battle of the ages!

software.name: World Heroes 2 Jet
software.Description: World Heroes 2 Jet, initially released in 1994, is the 3rd in the prolific fighting game series. Choose from 16 historical or well-known heroes, villains and fighters and battle your way to the top to become the world's greatest warrior! There are two types of modes in this version, "Tournament of Titans Mode", where you fight three bouts in one day, and if you are successful you move on to the next day, and "World Heroes Training Mode", where you can fight with any opponent. Furthermore, the addition of dash and back step, which were not in the previous version, as well as a countering system that ushers in a more speedy way of fighting, makes World Heroes 2 Jet even more enjoyable to play. There are also four competition types to choose from, allowing for even more in-depth battles.

software.name: World Heroes Perfect
software.Description: This is the fourth installment in the World Heroes fighting game series, released in 1995. In this game, 16 figures from across history fight for the title of the world's strongest. In previous installments, the amount of time you held a button down determined the strength or weakness of an attack, but that system has been removed in this game. In addition to a more orthodox fighting-game approach that enables weak, middle and strong attacks using different buttons, this game includes new elements such as the Hero Gauge, Extra Attacks and Guard Breaker Attacks, adding an exciting new layer of strategy.
